page.title: 02ROTHLEY FARMER CHANGES STOCK
page.content:
Farmer Jack Wright of Brookfields farm is a tenant farmer, which means he doesn't actually own any land himself.{He farms 500 acres: 250 {cereals and 250 grass, has 254 cows, 1 {bull, 130 pigs, 32 ewes, and 58 lambs. He has a lot of equipment including 5 tractors and 1 combine harvester.
Although Mr.Wright did a lot of dairy farming a few years ago, the EEC butter mountain has meant that{the {government has reduced how much milk {they will buy from him by 11%.}He had to sell{25 cows},and to keep up his money he had to look round for another form of farming. In the end, Mr.Wright chose to buy{130 pigs}.
This has meant a change in farming methods, and villagers have noticed a change in the smell from the farm!
